hours_text:
## Garden Admission

[Fernwood Members ](/membership) Free

Photography Day Pass, _5 people_ $75

Adults, _13-64_ $12  
Seniors, _65+_ $9  
Teachers & College Students $9

First Responders* $7  
Military** $7  
Youth, _5-12_ $7  
Children, _4 & under_ Free

LIGHTS at Fernwood [Click here to learn more](/lights)

Identification cards are required to utilize student, teacher, first responder, and military discounts.

An additional or separate fee may apply for some special events, including LIGHTS.

*FIRST RESPONDERS: Firefighters, EMT and Police.

**MILITARY: Veteran and active service members.

[ Fernwood Map ](/map)

## Garden Hours

Tuesday - Sunday, 11 am - 4 pm

### Cafe Hours

Tuesday - Sunday, 11 am - 3 pm

### LIGHTS Hours

6 - 9 pm, [click here](/lights) for specific dates & event info.

**GARDEN CLOSED**

 _July 4, September 21, Thanksgiving, December 24 & 25, December 31 & January 1 & 4._

* * *

## Garden Policies

**Pet Policy**

Pets are not permitted at Fernwood except for select special events. Service animals are welcome. Emotional support animals are not allowed. 

**Weapons Prohibition**

Visitors are prohibited from openly carrying or concealing firearms, air guns, and other weapons on Fernwood property, regardless of whether a federal or state license to possess such items has been issued to the visitor.

**Photography Policy**

The purpose of Fernwood’s photography policy is to enhance the guest experience while providing limited access to professional ph...

collections_text:
## Discover your garden, Fernwood.

**Fernwood’s mission** is to welcome and inspire all to explore, discover, and connect with nature and one another.

Public gardens like Fernwood are more important than ever in providing a safe haven of tranquility and natural beauty. We invite you to explore and enjoy Fernwood's vast 105 acres of gardens and natural areas. 

#### Fernwood is _your_ garden--naturally.

  * ## Visit

Fernwood’s 105 acres are open for all to enjoy and experience - all year long.

**Daytime garden hours are Tuesday - Sunday 11 am - 4 pm.**

[ Plan Your Visit ](/visit)

  * ## Café Open!

**The Grateful Pie Company at Fernwood** is NOW OPEN Tuesday - Sunday, 10 am - 4 pm.

[ Menu ](/dining)

  * ## Learn

Environmental education is a top priority as we are a living museum - there is much to discover about plants and animals!

[ Field Trips ](https://www.fernwoodbotanical.org/fieldtrips)

  * ## Art

The arts have always been important at Fernwood. The Clark Gallery and the Trillium Hall are two spaces located in the Visitors Center that feature rotating exhibitions.

[ Learn More ](/exhibitions)

  * ## Join

Membership has its privileges! By annually supporting your favorite public garden - Fernwood - you allow us to continue our work providing a space for learning, discovery, and peace in nature.

[ Become A Member ](/membership)

### Our Organization
